general: AFOracle. We are a team of dApp/tooling developers. We are based in Slovenia.
infrastructure: AFOracle. We run all of our infa. Flare and songbird nodes (also coston2 node for testing). Backup nodes and seperate server for exchange data agregation. Cca 2000 ero/month
safeguards: AFOracle. Yes we have a few safequards. Some are better than others but it is getting better.
availability: AFOracle. We started submiting on epoch 2 on SGB. We are among the oldest FTSO’s
selling: AFOracle.  We have to sell some to cover the taxes and infra costs (cca 30%)  We try to sell when volume spikes and not to crash the market. Cca 30% are left for longterm holding/compounding. Rest is sold when we see fit.
tooling: AFOracle. Connect libs, perifery. Some python tooling specific to flare…
